name: generator-tvml
description: Scaffold TVML Apps which can be developed with ES2015 modules using webpack including livereload

scripts.clean: npm link && rm -rf tmp && mkdir -p tmp
scripts.post-e2e: cd tmp && xcodebuild clean build -sdk appletvos10.2 -configuration Debug CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY="" CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO
scripts.postchangelog: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(changelog): Updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release:post: git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): New release version' && npm run changelog && npm run git-tag && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:post
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:post
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run release:post
scripts.version-and-push: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run merge-and-publish
scripts.merge-and-publish:pre: git checkout master && git merge develop && git push

author: Martin Reinhardt
